data.title: Announcing the jazz quartet that will be starring in John Coltrane: Legacy! üôåüèæ Let's hear it for Joe Lovano on the sax, Robi Botos on...
data.meta_description:
tolivegram on May 8, 2024: "Announcing the jazz quartet that will be starring in John Coltrane: Legacy! üôåüèæ

Let's hear it for Joe Lovano on the sax, Robi Botos on piano, Mike Downes on bass, plus a special soon-to-be-announced guest on drums! üé∑ü•Åüéπ

Multiple JUNO award-winner Mike Downes has been a prominent fixture both within the Canadian music scene and abroad, and has performed with Pat Metheny, Chris Potter, Michael Brecker, John Abercrombie, Peter Erskine, and many others. 

Robi Botos has been hailed as one of the most diverse multi-instrumentalists of this generation. His influences include the hard-bop style of Bill Evans and Herbie Hancock, the swing of Oscar Peterson, and the heartfelt melodic expression of Mulgrew Miller and Cedar Walton.

Tickets are selling fast so be sure to get yours soon at the link in our bio.

@torontosymphony eoutwater @joelovanojazz @johncoltrane @mikedownesmusic @robibotos 

[Image descriptions: A carousel post with three images. The first is a black-and-white photo of Robi Botos. He's wearing a hat and sunglasses and looking up. The second image is a black-and-white photo of Mike Downes playing the bass. The last image is a photo of Joe Lovano playing the sax. He's wearing a grey suit jacket and a dark-red hat. The background is yellow.]".
